short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically expands all thumbnails on Old Reddit + Reddit.com with the old look

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically expand all thumbnails when navigating through Reddit with the old skin or old.reddit.com
